title: Smart Data models -Waste Water Plant schema
description: Data model for waste water treatment plant.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be WasteWaterPlant

no3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nitrate concentration measured in waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

bod.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Biological Oxygen Demand concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

inFlow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. In-flow amount into the treatment plant/reservoir corresponding to this observation

toc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Organic Carbon concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

nh4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ammonium concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

redox.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reduction potential or oxidation measured in waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

do.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Dissolved oxygen measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

treatmentPlantId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unique identification number for the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

outFlow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Out-flow amount into the treatment plant/reservoir corresponding to this observation

tss.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total suspended solids concentration measured in a waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

treatmentPlantCapacity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Handling capacity of the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

tic.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Inorganic Carbon concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

tn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Nitrogen concentration measured in waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

po4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ortho-phosphate concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

cod.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Chemical Oxygen Demand concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

treatmentPlantName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

treatmentPlantCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Unique code for the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation

observationDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Last reported time of observation

pHTSA.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Acidity level or basicity level observed in the water. Object defining the temporal processing of the magnitude property during a period. It provides maximum, minimum, instant value and average

avgOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the average value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

maxOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the maximum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

instValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the instantaneous value (associated with the current timestamp) of a time varying quantity.

minOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the minimum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value.

municipalityInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Municipality information corresponding to this observation

district.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. District name corresponding to this observation.

ulbName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the Urban Local Body corresponding to this observation.

cityId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. City Id corresponding to this observation.

wardId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Ward Id corresponding to this observation.

stateName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the state corresponding to this observation.

cityName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. City name corresponding to this observation

zoneName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Zone name corresponding to this observation.

zoneId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Zone Id corresponding to this observation.

wardName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Ward name corresponding to this observation.

wardNum.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ward number corresponding to this observation.
